summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of PBX subscription model completed. All 12 features tested successfully. Landing page, pricing, navigation, onboarding flows, dashboard, and FX simulator all working correctly.

landing_page.details: Landing page loads with all 4 subscription tiers (Basic, Premium, SME, Enterprise), hero section, FX rate preview card, and 'Why PBX is Different' section

navigation_links.details: All navigation links work: Pricing, How It Works, Business, Get Started

pricing_page.details: Displays all 4 tiers with correct pricing ($0, $10/mo, $50/mo, Custom), FX spreads (~1.5%, ~0.8%, ~0.5%, ~0.3%), and feature comparison table

how_it_works_page.details: Shows 4-step process (Create Account, Add Funds, Send Money, Recipient Gets Paid) with step numbers 01-04

business_page.details: B2B/SME page with 'For Business' badge, 4 benefits (Save on FX, Scalable Solutions, Dedicated Support, API Integration)

roadmap_page.details: Product roadmap with Q1-Q4 2025 quarters, status badges (Done, In Progress, Planned)

personal_onboarding.details: 3-step flow works: Email → KYC (Full Name, ID) → Plan Selection (Basic/Premium with RECOMMENDED badge). Redirects to /app/dashboard after completion

business_onboarding.details: 4-step flow works: Email → Plan (SME/Enterprise) → Company Info → FX Preferences. Shows Business badge on dashboard after completion

dashboard.details: Shows wallet balance ($250.00 USD), recent activity, upgrade CTA, quick links, Send Money and View Wallet buttons

fx_simulator.details: Plan selector works with all 4 tiers. USD/PHP conversion correct: Basic=54.20, Premium=54.60, SME=54.80, Enterprise=54.85. Transfer fee shows $2.00 for Basic, Free for others

theme.details: Filipino premium theme applied with gold (#F6C94B) and navy (#0A2540) colors throughout the app

session_management.details: Session context works correctly - user stays logged in after onboarding, plan and user info persisted

critical_code_review_comments: All APIs are MOCKED - no backend integration. Session management uses sessionStorage only.
FX rates are simulated/hardcoded in FXSimulator.jsx component
Onboarding flows use setTimeout to simulate API calls
test_credentials: No credentials needed - all flows are mocked for demo
seed_data_creation: None - uses mock data from mockData.js
context_for_next_testing_agent: All subscription model features working. Landing page, pricing, onboarding (personal 3-step, business 4-step), dashboard with FX simulator all tested. Theme colors (gold/navy) applied correctly. All APIs are MOCKED.
